frontmatter.title: B.Tech & MS in Computer Science Engineering
frontmatter.company: International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad

node.html:
• Courses: Data Structures and Algorithms, Operating Systems, Analysis Of Algorithms, Machine Data and Learning, Probability and Statistics, Linear Algebra, Database and Application, Data Systems, Distributed Systems, Design and Analysis of Software Systems, Mobile Robotics, Statistical Methods in AI, Principles of Information Security, Cognitive Neuroscience
  • Research Projects:
    • Data Sciences and Analytics Centre: GPT-Driven Web Profile Consolidation for Identical Names. Submitted at ACM WWW '24 for consideration
    • Cognitive Science Lab: Performed an in-depth maulti facetd analysis of over 200+ Mergers & Acquisition to understand the Impact of Winner's Curse in the Indian Stock Market.
  • Teaching Assistant:
    • Data Structures and Algorithm
    • Data Systems
  • Positions of Responsibilities:
    • Head of Sponsorship and Collaboration Team for Felicity, the annual Techno-Cultural Fest @ IIIT
    • Head of Sponsorship and Collaboration Team for Entrepreneurship Cell @ IIIT
    • Head of Campus Life Committee @ IIIT

• Investment Foundations Certified: Pertaining to strong interest in the field of Finance and World Economies, I Completed the certification in February 2022.
  • Candidte for CFA Level 1 for the February 2024 cohort.

• JEE Advanced: Appeared in National Level Entrance Examination (IIT-JEE), that consistently ranked as one of the toughest exams in the world.
  • Emerged in the top 3% of around 200,000 brightest minds in India.
  • Secured an All India Rank of 8000.
  • JEE Mains: A qualifying Exam for JEE Advance.
  • Emerged in the top 0.01% of around 1.5 million students in India.
  • Secured an All India Rank of 5200
